Articles.Content: My friend and I use the same game version, mod version and obviously mods. However there is a difference, RemoteTech works for him normally, but for me it keeps saying N/A on the top left with the red calculator thing icon. I have no idea how to fix this, and no one has ever encountered this problem apparently since I can't find any answers, sp can anyone help?

12 minutes ago, JimTheGentlemanGR said:

My friend and I use the same game version, mod version and obviously mods. However there is a difference, RemoteTech works for him normally, but for me it keeps saying N/A on the top left with the red calculator thing icon. I have no idea how to fix this, and no one has ever encountered this problem apparently since I can't find any answers, sp can anyone help?
